div.p:
Important Notice: Due to COVID-19 concerns, the granting committee has made the decision to push the due date to May 15th. At this time, we are unable to say that that will be the sure date for the grants to be reviewed. Once the pandemic has passed, we will review all grants and get back to you as soon as possible. Thank you for your cooperation-Skyler Stamps
This year we are giving priority funding to grants that . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about HELP Grant Deadline Extended

h3.a: DIagonal School Closed for Year/Breakfast and Lunch To Be Served

div.p:
The Diagonal School is now closed for the remainder of the school year under order of Governor Reynolds. Prom and graduation dates are to be determined and we will let you know when any decisions are made. Track is canceled for this year. Softball/baseball is yet to be determined, but the earliest the season may begin is June 1.
As a reminder, the school continues to serve breakfast and . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about DIagonal School Closed for Year/Breakfast and Lunch To Be Served

div.p: Click Here to be taken to Iowa Healthiest State website.

a.aria-label: Read more about Iowa Healthiest State Website

div.p:
Notice of Non-Discrimination
It is the policy of the Diagonal Community School not to discriminate on the basis of race, creed, color, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, gender, disability, religion, age, socioeconomic status, political party affiliation or actual or potential parental, family or marital status in its programs, activities or employment practices as required by the . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Grievance Procedure/Non-Discrimination Link

li.title: Pay Your School Bills Online-Now With No Fee

h5.a: Pay Your School Bills Online-Now With No Fee

div.p: The Diagonal Community School has added a new feature for your convenience, online bill pay. You may now pay any school bill (lunch, milk, Tina's Tots, etc) via our secure online portal. Simply click here to be taken to the sign-in page. Note: The fee to use this service has been discontinued. It is now TOTALLY FREE! As always, you can still mail your check in or send it to the school.

a.aria-label: Read more about Pay Your School Bills Online-Now With No Fee

div.em: Current conditions as of 24 Apr 07:35 am CDT

td.span: A chance of showers before 1pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 1pm and 2pm, then showers likely and possibly a thunderstorm after 2pm. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 66. Light and variable wind becoming east southeast 5 to 9 mph in the morning. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.
A 50 percent chance of showers, mainly before 10pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 46. North northeast wind around 11 mph. New precipitation amounts of less than a tenth of an inch possible.
Mostly sunny, with a high near 65. North wind 10 to 13 mph.

div.a: This institution is an equal opportunity provider.

div.div: All School Policies and Legal Restrictions are on the "Resources" page. Please go there for information.
